Alternatives

Try out these alternatives. They each offer privacy and security features built-in. Check your app store for iOS and Android versions as well.

  • Firefox
  • Brave
  • Opera
  • Epic
  • Firefox Focus - Mobile
  • Vivaldi
  • Tenta
